name: Apple
desc: Juicy red apple used for cooking, eating raw or cider production

name: Banana
desc: Curved yellow fruit

name: Cabbage
desc: Thick green or purple leaves surrounding a spherical heart or head of young leaves

name: Dill
desc: Herb used in pickling

name: Eggplant
desc: Eggplants are similar to summer squash or zucchini: tender, mild, and sweet with a slight vegetal bitterness

name: Fennel
desc: Fennel has a mild licorice flavor and can be thinly sliced and eaten raw or cooked

name: Chicken
desc: Chicken is the most common poultry in the world. used in variety of cuisine

name: Beef
desc: Beef contains protein, iron, and vitamin B12. Beef is used in steak

name: Salmon
desc: Wild Atlantic Salmon used in variety of seafood dishes and logos

name: Milk
desc: Nutrient rich for bone development

name: Icecream
desc: Sweetened frozen food comes in a variety of flavours

desc: Chocolate covered wafer bar that comes in a variety of flavours

name: Smarties
desc: Chocolate covered sugar coated candy that comes in a variety of colour

name: Ginger
desc: Flowering plant that is used as a spice. It can be eaten raw, cooked or used in herbal medicine

name: Ham
desc: Pork from a leg cut that has been preserved by curing

name: Potato
desc: Starchy root vegetable used as a base in variety of dishes

name: Carrot
desc: Orange root vegetable used in a variety of meals or salads

name: Cheese
desc: Protein and fats from milk in a variety of flavors

name: Yogurt

name: Butter
desc: Churned milk used in baking, sauce making and pan frying

name: Gummy bears
desc: Bear shaped gummy snack

name: Avocado

name: Grapes
desc: Grapes can be eaten fresh, or used in wine, jam, vinegar or dried for raisins

name: Beets
desc: Taproot portion of a beet plant. Earthy flavour used in salads

name: Blueberries
desc: Bluerries are used in cake, jam, or eating fresh

name: Broccoli

name: Cucumber
desc: Green vegetable used for salads and pickling

name: Green Beans
desc: Green beans are can be eaten fresh, steamed, or stir-fried and commonly used in soups, stews and casseroles

name: Garlic
desc: Bulbous flowering plant used to ward off vampires. Key ingredient in garlic bread

desc: Leafy vegetable used as a base in salads

name: Limes

name: Kale
desc: Green leafy super food

name: Mushrooms
desc: Vegan meat used in cooking for its umami flavour

desc: woody fruit that can be consumed fresh, juiced or canned

desc: A red berry used for smoothies, jam, or eating raw

name: Watermelon
desc: Used for smoothies, cook outs, or eating fresh
